title: I bugsplat when I Alt + Tab
body: {{item:3070}} Whenever I change my resolution or just Alt + Tab my game crashes and I bugsplat, anyway to fix this?{{item:3070}}

replies.body:
It could be specific resolutions that are causing problems, but most bugsplats are caused by driver or hardware issues. I suggest working through the common solutions we've consolidated in our [Bugsplat & Crash guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes)

Let me know if those steps caused any stability to return.
